title: Bug 3666CodeCompletion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)
description: Bug 3666CodeCompletionHungry code assist (1GDRYW5) jkca (5/15/2001 11:04:56 AM)jresdk 106Under certain circumstances code assist eats too much code.Consider the enclosed class.As a programmer, I must add a parameter to the baz call in bar to make the program correct.Steps:1. UI can decide whether it wants to use the codeassist end position (until the end of current identifier) or the cursor location it used to start with, so as to control the amount of source to replace. Removing codeassist option.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the enclosed class.
2. In the 'bar' method, add a parameter to the 'baz' call, for example:
   baz(x.foo(), 0);
3. Note the changed code to: baz(x.foo().foo())
4. Expect the code to be: baz(x.foo(), x.foo())
